TEXT.S: Cyaqung ni arung Snruan kari utux Pu-nong-cu- cyaqung ni arung (-) Seuxal o niqan kingal seejiq ni kingal arung,dha nii o mseupu musa hruan spriq,pspung psqama gmiya. Rmngaw seejiq ka arung: nmai spama ka gmiya haw, yaku o mniq ku gmiya hiya. spama gmiya ka seejiq do, asi nhari kmarig dxgal ka arung, krmux Ruwan dxgal stling na. mhdu spama ka gmiya do,
